casebody.data:
Mario JUAREZ and Whitney Juarez, Individually; Whitney Juarez, as Parent and Natural Guardian of Marley Juarez, a Minor; and Whitney Juarez, as Parent and Natural Guardian of Landon Juarez, a Minor, Appellants,
v.
Teri L. ST. HILAIRE, as Personal Representative of the Estate of Norman G. Graf, Deceased; Grow Financial Federal Credit Union; and RS & H, Inc., a Florida Corporation, as Successor in Interest to Reynolds, Smith and Hills, Inc., a Florida Corporation, Appellees. Case No. 2D17-5022 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed November 14, 2018

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
